# The `GAddSubCarryInOut` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Represents overflowing add/sub operations that also consume a carry-in.

G&#95;UADDE, G&#95;SADDE, G&#95;USUBE, G&#95;SSUBE
